mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mold_initial_parameter WHERE mold_code = #{moldCode} ORDER BY create_time DESC, update_time DESC, id DESC
SELECT * FROM mold_initial_parameter WHERE mold_code = #{moldCode} ORDER BY update_time DESC, create_time DESC, id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM mold_initial_parameter WHERE application_no = #{applicationNo} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
